about.title: About
about.text: Creative web solutions with modern technologies. Specialized in React, Three.js, and performance optimization.

newsletter.title: Newsletter
newsletter.text: Stay updated on new projects and articles.

hero.text: Discover my interactive web projects – from experimental prototypes to full applications. All projects are dynamically loaded from my GitHub repository.

blog.headline: Knowledge & Insights
blog.subline: In our blog, we share practical tips on web design, SEO, performance, and online marketing – explained simply and directly applicable.
blog.related_title: You might also be interested in
blog.cta_text: Do you need help with web design, performance optimization, or SEO? Let's talk about it without obligation.

meta.title: Abdulkerim Sesli — Digital Creator Portfolio
meta.description: Abdulkerim Sesli — Web Developer & Photographer in Berlin. Specialized in React, Three.js and Urban Photography. Portfolio, References & Contact.

farewell.heading: Goodbye!
farewell.p1: Thank you very much for taking the time to visit my website! I am Abdulkerim, a passionate web developer from Berlin who loves turning digital visions into reality.
farewell.p2: As a Digital Creator, I combine modern technologies with creative design to create websites that not only work efficiently but also delight and inspire visitors. My mission is to make the internet more accessible and aesthetic.
farewell.p3: I hope my projects and ideas have fascinated you. Every line of code I write carries a piece of my passion - from the first idea to the final release.
farewell.p4: Do you have questions, interest in a collaboration, or just want to chat? Do not hesitate to contact me via my channels. It was a real pleasure having you here!
farewell.strong: Thank you for your interest – I look forward to your next visit!
